ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(( AgeOfParticipants_Mokopuna__c + AgeOfParticipants_Taiohi__c + AgeOfParticipants_Rangatahi13_19__c + AgeOfParticipants_Matua_20_39__c + AgeOfParticipants_Pakeke40_59__c + AgeOfParticipants_Kaum_tua__c + AgeOfParticipants_DidNotRespond__c ) <> (Participation_NoOfParticipants__c) , True, False)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: TOTAL PARTICIPANTS NOT MATCHING WITH 'AGE OF PARTICIPANTS'
